title: MVC
content: Use this paradigm for separation of concerns. MVC (Model-View-Controller) is a pattern in software design commonly used to implement user interfaces, data, and controlling logic.

title: View Layer
content: I'm learning to use handlebars as template engine. Handlebars is largely compatible with Mustache templates. Handlebars compiles templates into JavaScript functions
